Name: ShotSword
Description:
Caution! This mod appears to not work with some people, I'm trying to fix this but this takes me some time as I don't own the headsets where the problem occurs, sorry.

This is a quite dangerous sword, but also a deadly shotgun!
Load this weapon with Dragon's Breath ammo and unleash terror among sliced and grilled sosigs!

The weapon is in "Shotguns > Tube Fed"
It holds 3 rounds in the internal mag plus one in the chamber
It features a "Hidden" attachment point on the top for stuff like a laser pointer
